XXbsu029_u:239: na khila mala na cāpi roṣacittaṃ na ca punareṣati kasyacit sadoṣam /
XXbsu029_u:243: tyajati tadanapekṣya pravrajitvā girigahane vicaranti mokṣakāmāḥ // 73 //
XXbsu029_u:244: araṇya vividha sevamāno bhavati aniśrita sarvajñātralābhe /
XXbsu029_u:245: kāya api ca jīvite 'napekṣo viharati siṃha ivottrasan jitārim // 74 //
XXbsu029_u:246: bhavati ca itaretareṇa tuṣṭaḥ śakunisamaḥ sada saṃcayaṃ vihāya /
XXbsu029_u:247: na ca bhavati niketu sarvaloke jñāna gaveṣati nitya bodhimārge // 75 //
XXbsu029_u:248: eka viharati yathaiva khaḍgo na ca puna sa trasate yathaiva siṃhaḥ /
XXbsu029_u:249: na ca bhuvi viśvasate mṛgeva trasto na ca punarunnamate sa pūjanena // 76
XXbsu029_u:251: ahamapi jagato 'sya trāṇabhūto yadi kuśaleṣu careyamapramattaḥ // 77 //
XXbsu029_u:253: viharati na ca sajjate 'nilo vā naravaracaryāmimābhīpsamānaḥ // 78 //
XXbsu029_u:255: śamadamanirato viśālabuddhiḥ amṛtarasena ca sarvadā sa tuṣṭaḥ // 79 //
XXbsu029_u:256: prativadasi yathā (vasapathā ?) ca bodhimārge sa tu pariśodhayate sadāśayaṃ ca /
XXbsu029_u:257: dhāraṇīpratilābhameṣamāṇaḥ sahati ca duḥkha satāṃ guṇābhikāṅkṣī // 80 //
XXbsu029_u:259: imu carimabhivīkṣya bodhisattvo yo bhavate 'rthiku śo bhaveta tuṣṭaḥ /
XXbsu029_u:260: ya iha bhavati bodhaye asakto janayati doṣaśatāni so 'lpabuddhiḥ // 81 //
XXbsu029_u:268: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyā velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
XXbsu029_u:269: nityamagaurava te hi bhavanti āryaguruṣvapi mātṛpitṛṣu /
XXbsu029_u:272: kaścidapīha samo mama nāsti vakṣyati śīlaguṇeṣu kathaṃcit // 83 //
XXbsu029_u:273: te ca parasparameva ca dviṣṭā chidragaveṣaṇanityaprayuktāḥ /
XXbsu029_u:277: bodhipathādapi nitya sudūre āryadhanādapi te ca sudūre /
XXbsu029_u:278: mokṣapathaṃ ca vihāya praṇītaṃ pañcasu te gatiṣu bhamiṣyanti // 86 //
XXbsu029_u:279: catvāra ime rāṣṭrapāla bodhisattvānāṃ bodhiparipanthakārakā dharmāḥ /
XXbsu029_u:285: ime rāṣṭrapāla bodhisattvānāṃ catvāro bodhiparipanthakārakā dharmāḥ //
XXbsu029_u:286: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
XXbsu029_u:287: aśraddhāḥ kusīdāḥ sada mūḍhacittā abhimāninaste 'pi sadā ca krodhanā /
XXbsu029_u:288: kṣamiṇaśca dṛṣṭvā sada bhikṣu yuktaṃ dāsyanti daṇḍaṃ vrajato vihārāt // 87
XXbsu029_u:289: parasya pūjārthamiherṣya jātā avasthānu cittasya ca teṣu nāsti /
XXbsu029_u:292: dūre itaste mama śāsanasya guṇadveṣiṇaste hi apāyanimnāḥ /
XXbsu029_u:293: tyaktvā jinasyāpi ca śāsanaṃ te yāsyantyapāyaṃ jvalitaṃ pracaṇḍam // 89 //
XXbsu029_u:294: śrutvā ca teṣāmiha pāpacaryām adharmayuktāṃ ca gatiṃ sudāruṇām /
XXbsu029_u:295: yujyadhva nityaṃ sada bodhimārge mā tapsyathā durgatiṣūpapannāḥ // 90 //
XXbsu029_u:296: bahukalpakoṭībhi kadāci buddho utpadyate lokahito maharṣiḥ /
XXbsu029_u:297: labdho 'dhunā sa pravaraḥ kṣaṇo 'dya tyaja pramādaṃ yadi mokṣakāmaḥ // 91
XXbsu029_u:298: catvāra ime rāṣṭrapāla pudgalā bodhisattvena na sevitavyāḥ /
XXbsu029_u:299: katame catvāraḥ ? pāpamitraṃ rāṣṭrapāla pudgalo bodhisattvena na sevitavyaḥ /
XXbsu029_u:300: upalambhadṛṣṭiko rāṣṭrapāla pudgalo bodhisattvena na sevitavyaḥ /
XXbsu029_u:301: saddharmapratikṣepakaḥ pudgalo rāṣṭrapāla bodhisattvena na sevitavyaḥ /
XXbsu029_u:302: āmiṣalolupaḥ pudgalo rāṣṭrapāla bodhisattvena na sevitavyaḥ /
XXbsu029_u:303: ime rāṣṭrapāla catvāraḥ pudgalā bodhisattvena na sevitavyāḥ //
XXbsu029_u:304: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
XXbsu029_u:305: ye pāpamitrāṇi vivarjayanti kalpāṇamitrāṇi sadā bhajanti /
XXbsu029_u:306: vardhanti te bodhipatheṣu nityaṃ yatha śuklapakṣe divi candramaṇḍalam //
XXbsu029_u:307: upalambhadṛṣṭyāṃ ca sadā niviṣṭā ātme niviṣṭāstatha jīvapoṣe /
XXbsu029_u:308: viṣakumbhavatte sada varjayanti ye buddhajñānena bhavanti arthikāḥ // 93
XXbsu029_u:309: kṣipanti ye dharma narottamānāṃ śāntaṃ virāgamamṛtānukūlam /
XXbsu029_u:310: tān varjayenmīḍhaghaṭāṃ yathaiva ya icchate budhyitumagrabodhim // 94 //
XXbsu029_u:311: adhyoṣitā āmiṣa pātracīvare kulasaṃstave caiva sadābhiyuktāḥ /
XXbsu029_u:312: kurvīta sārdhaṃ na hi teṣu saṃstavaṃ tān varjayedagnikhadhāṃ (khadāṃ)
XXbsu029_u:314: yasyepsitaṃ dharṣayituṃ hi māraṃ pravartituṃ cakravaraṃ hyanuttaram /
XXbsu029_u:315: sattvārthamevaṃ vipulaṃ ca kartuṃ varjyāśca tenāpi ca pāpamitrāḥ // 96 //
XXbsu029_u:316: vivarjayitvā ca priyāpriyāṇi lābhaṃ yaśo bhaṇḍanamānamīrṣyām /
XXbsu029_u:317: eṣeta nityaṃ sada buddhajñānaṃ ya icchate budhyitumagrabodhim // 97 //
XXbsu029_u:319: catvāra ime rāṣṭrapāla bodhisattvānāṃ duḥkhavipākā dharmāḥ /
XXbsu029_u:320: katame catvāraḥ ? jñānenābhimanyanatā rāṣṭrapāla bodhisattvānāṃ duḥkhavipāko dharmaḥ /
XXbsu029_u:325: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
XXbsu029_u:326: dharmadharā bhuvi ye tu bhavanti pūjita sarvajageṣu bhavanti /
XXbsu029_u:327: avamanyati tāni ājñaḥ (?) tena sa vindati duḥkhamanantam // 98 //
XXbsu029_u:328: viṣameṇa sa deśati bhogen chandaruciḥ sada jñāni aśuddhe /
XXbsu029_u:329: mānonnata yaśca hi nityaṃ namate guruāryajaneṣu // 99 //
XXbsu029_u:330: adhimukti na vidyati buddhe dharmagaṇe ca na tasyadhimuktiḥ /
XXbsu029_u:332: sa itaścyuto hi manujeṣu karmavaśādabudho hi vimūḍhaḥ /
XXbsu029_u:333: narakeṣvatha tiryaggatiṣu pretagatiṣu ca vandati duḥkham /
XXbsu029_u:335: tena apāyapathaṃ pravihāya bodhipathaḥ satataṃ hi niṣevyaḥ // 102 //
XXbsu029_u:340: anigṛhītacittasya jñānavirahitasya pramādasevanatā rāṣṭrapāla bodhisattvasya bandhanam /
XXbsu029_u:343: atha khalu bhagavaṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
XXbsu029_u:344: avamanyati nitya parasya bhāvayate sada laukikadhyānam /
XXbsu029_u:345: badhyati tebhi sa dṛṣṭiśatebhiḥ paṅki gajo yatha durbalakāyaḥ // 103 //
XXbsu029_u:349: so avamanyana manyana tyaktvā yujyati bodhipathe satataṃ ca // 105 //
XXbsu029_u:351: tyaktva priyāpriyajñātramaśeṣaṃ buddha bhavanti vikalmaṣa dhīrāḥ // 106 //
XXbsu029_u:355: kalpa acintiya pūrva carantaḥ sattvahitāya caran varabodhau /
XXbsu029_u:356: dānadame niyame 'pi ca nityaṃ susthita āsi tyajitva ca jñātīn // 108 //
XXbsu029_u:357: prāntavane sada nitya rato 'haṃ śoṣita āśrayu bodhinidānam /
XXbsu029_u:358: na ca saṃsṛtu vīryaṃ kadācideṣata jñāna mahāpuruṣāṇām // 109 //
XXbsu029_u:360: kṛtva kṛpāṃ vipulāmiha pūrve ārjita bodhi balājjagadarthe // 110 //
XXbsu029_u:361: duhitṛsvasutāḥ priyabhāryāḥ tyakta purā dhanadhānya prabhūtāḥ /
XXbsu029_u:362: jīvita iṣṭa mahī susamṛddhā eṣata bodhivarāṃ bahukalpān // 111 //
XXbsu029_u:363: phalapuṣpajalāḍhya suramya āsi vane muni kṣāntirato 'ham /
XXbsu029_u:364: chinna karau caraṇau kalirājñā naiva mano 'pi tadā mama duṣṭam // 112 //
XXbsu029_u:365: vanakandari śyāmaku nāma āsi munirbharato gurujīrṇo /
XXbsu029_u:368: kāye na ca me na ca jīve bodhinimittamavekṣya babhūva // 114 //
XXbsu029_u:372: śoṣitu ratnanidāna samudraḥ prāpya maṇiṃ sukhitāḥ kṛta sattvāḥ // 116 //
XXbsu029_u:375: duḥkhita vīkṣya naraṃ ca daridraṃ tyakta mayā priyameva śarīram /
XXbsu029_u:376: prāpya dhanaṃ sa kṛtaśca mayāḍhyaḥ sarvadadena nṛpeṇa satā me // 118 //
XXbsu029_u:377: śaraṇāgata vīkṣya kapotaṃ svaṃ piśitaṃ vinikṛtya śarīrāt /
XXbsu029_u:378: dattamapi svatanurna bhayārtastyakta ihāpi nṛpeṇa satā me // 119 //
XXbsu029_u:380: jīvita tyajya parasya dadau taṃ kesarirāja babhūva yadāham // 120 //
XXbsu029_u:382: caratā ca purā jagadarthe madri pativrata tyakta saputrā /
XXbsu029_u:385: uttaptavīryu yada āsīt arthadhanaśriyo 'pi ca purā me // 122 //
XXbsu029_u:387: pūjā kṛtā daśabalānām āsi nṛpātmaji vimalatejāḥ // 123 //
XXbsu029_u:388: raudrākṣa eva ca ruṣitvā yācitavān sa cāpi mama śīrṣam /
XXbsu029_u:389: dattaṃ nikṛtya ca mayā tad rāja yadā ca candraprabha āsīt // 124 //
XXbsu029_u:391: sattvārtha sthāpit mayā te puṇyasamo babhūva ca yadāham // 125 //
XXbsu029_u:393: tyaktāṃ pūrvabhaveṣu caratā me āsi yadā śubho nṛpati pūrve // 126 //
XXbsu029_u:395: tyaktaśca me makuṭa pūrva āsi nṛpo yadā ratanacūḍaḥ // 127 //
XXbsu029_u:397: tyaktau karau sacaraṇau me pūrva nṛpeṇa dhṛtimatā ca // 128 //
XXbsu029_u:399: kṛta mānuṣā badaradvīpe siṃhala sārthavāha yada āsīt // 129 //
XXbsu029_u:400: kāmeṣu mṛrcchitamanā me bāli sa rākṣasī pramadasaṃjñā /
XXbsu029_u:401: pañcaśatāni vaṇijānāṃ mokṣita te yadā bhave sunetraḥ // 130 //
XXbsu029_u:403: pravrajya nirgatu jinasya śāsane puṇyaraśmi yada āsīt // 131 //
XXbsu029_u:404: mayi tyaktamaṅguli udārā sattvahitārthameva caratā me /
XXbsu029_u:405: jālārcitā vimalaśuddhā kāñcanavarṇa pārthiva yada āsīt // 132 //
XXbsu029_u:407: tyaktā mayā ca jagadarthe utpalanetre pārthiva yadāsīt // 133 //
XXbsu029_u:409: parimocitā karuṇayā me keśava vaidyarāja yada āsīt // 134 //
XXbsu029_u:410: vyādhyāturaṃ ca naramīkṣya svaṃ rudhiraṃ pradattamapi me 'bhūt /
XXbsu029_u:411: nirvyādhitaḥ sa ca kṛto me prāgbhava sarvadarśi yadabhūvam // 135 //
XXbsu029_u:413: hitvā svamasthi ca śarīrād vyādhikṛśasya majja mayā dattam /
XXbsu029_u:414: na ca sattva tyakta maya jātu āsi nṛpo yadā kusuma nāma // 136 //
XXbsu029_u:415: sarvasvakośamapi tyaktva jīvita tyakta me priya manāpam /
XXbsu029_u:416: naru mokṣito vyasanaprāpta āsi nṛpo 'rthasiddhi yada pūrvam // 137 //
XXbsu029_u:418: nṛpa āśuketu yada āsīd bodhimabhīpsamāna jagadarthe // 138 //
XXbsu029_u:419: nṛpa sarvadarśi yada āsīt kāruṇiko janārthahitakāmaḥ /
XXbsu029_u:420: tyaktā mayā caturo 'pi ca dvīpāḥ sphītanarairvranarīśataiśca // 139 //
XXbsu029_u:421: mṛdu komalaṃ vikalagauraṃ ūru tacchittva hṝṣṭamuditāyā /
XXbsu029_u:422: dattaṃ svamāṃsa rudhiraṃ me jñānavatī yadāsi nṛpaputrī // 140 //
XXbsu029_u:424: strī prekṣya me kṣudhatṛṣārtaṃ sā rūpya (pa ?) vatīti vanitā yadābhūt //
XXbsu029_u:427: rājñaḥ suto tu vikṛtajñaḥ tārita sāgarādyada kṛtajñaḥ /
XXbsu029_u:428: ratnārtha netra mama tena uddhṛta naiva me ruṣita cittam // 143 //
XXbsu029_u:429: mā bhūtpipīlikavadho me tyakta varāśrayo 'pi canapekṣya /
XXbsu029_u:430: na ca citta kampita tadā me tyakta pūrvabhaveṣu godha yada āsīt // 144 //
XXbsu029_u:432: na ca mānavānapi ca stabdha āsi kapiṃjalo vicaramāṇaḥ // 145 //
XXbsu029_u:433: śaraṇāgatasya ca mayārthe tyakta samucchrayaḥ kṛpa janitvā /
XXbsu029_u:434: na ca tyakta vānaragatena vyādhanaraḥ śarābhinihatena // 146 //
XXbsu029_u:435: gajavaśagatena śoṣito me tanurapi vṛddhaguruṃ jagatsmaritvā /
XXbsu029_u:436: suruciramaśanaṃ mayā na bhuktaṃ mokṣita ātma gajā yadā tadāsīt // 147 //
XXbsu029_u:437: ṛkṣapatirabhūva śailadurge himahata sapta dināni rakṣito me /
XXbsu029_u:438: puruṣa vadhaku tena me prayukto na ca pratighāta kṛtaśca me tadāsmin //
XXbsu029_u:440: sa viṣeṇa śareṇa ca viddho daṃṣṭravarāṃstyajamāna na dviṣṭaḥ // 149 //
XXbsu029_u:444: gaṅgataraṅgajalairhiyamāṇaḥ tārita me yada āsi mṛgatve /
XXbsu029_u:445: vadhakā mama tenapanītā naiva mano mama tatra praduṣṭam // 151 //
XXbsu029_u:447: taiśca hataḥ kṣudhitaiśca tadāhaṃ kacchapayonigato 'pi ca maitraḥ // 152
XXbsu029_u:448: bodhicariṃ caramāṇahu pūrvaṃ matsya babhūva yadā jalacarī /
XXbsu029_u:451: sattva kṛtāḥ sukhitā nirujāśca prāṇaku saumya tadā ca yadāsīt // 154 //
XXbsu029_u:452: siṃha babhūva yadā mṛgarājā sthāmabalānvita kāruṇikaśca /
XXbsu029_u:453: viddha śareṇa na dūṣita cittaṃ maitri tadā vadhake 'pi tadā me // 155 //
XXbsu029_u:454: śaṅkhatuṣāranibho hayarājā āsi purā ca samudrataṭe 'ham /
XXbsu029_u:455: rākṣasimadhyagatā vaṇijo me tārita kṛtva kṛpāṃ karuṇāṃ ca // 156 //
XXbsu029_u:456: bodhicariṃ caramāṇa janārthe āsi kuṇāla ahaṃ yada pakṣī /
XXbsu029_u:457: varjita kāmaguṇā bahudoṣā no ca vaśaṃ pramadāna gato 'ham // 157 //
XXbsu029_u:458: āsi śaśo vanagulmanivāsī śāsatī taṃ sukṛte śaśavargam /
XXbsu029_u:460: āsi śuko drumapuṣpaphalāḍhyo śuṣkadrumo na ca me sa hi tyaktaḥ /
XXbsu029_u:461: dṛṣṭa kṛtajña tadā mama śakrastaṃ kṛtavāṃstaru patraphalāḍhyam // 159 //
XXbsu029_u:463: rājabhayāttu vimokṣita te me vānararāja ahaṃ yada āsīt // 160 //
XXbsu029_u:464: śuka bhūta purā guruhetoḥ śāli haraṃśca nareṇa gṛhītaḥ /
XXbsu029_u:465: kiṃ nu śukā harase mama śāli nāśayate 'pi ca pakṣi maśasyam ( matsasyam)
XXbsu029_u:466: śuka so 'bravīdbhadra śṛṇuṣva caurya harāmi na te ahu śālim /
XXbsu029_u:467: jīrṇagurudvayapoṣaṇahetoḥ śāli harāmi kṛpārtha tu teṣām // 162 //
XXbsu029_u:469: bīja prakīrṇa yadā prathamaṃ te bhāga dadāmi sarvajanasya /
XXbsu029_u:470: tacca giraṃ vadato mama śrutvā tenāpi caurya bhavenna kadācit // 163 //
XXbsu029_u:471: sādhu śukā hara śāli yatheṣṭaṃ durlabha mānuṣa yasyimu bhaktiḥ /
XXbsu029_u:472: mānuṣa tvaṃ maya tīryagatehā sādhu damaḥ śama saṃyama tubhyam // 164 //
XXbsu029_u:473: ityevamāni caritāni pūrva caranta duṣkara kṛtāni /
XXbsu029_u:474: na ca me manasi tatra bhavi kheda eṣata uttamāṃ viraja bodhim // 165 //
XXbsu029_u:475: ādhyātmikaṃ hyatha ca bāhyaṃ nāsti hi vastu yanmayā na dattam /
XXbsu029_u:476: śīle ca kṣānti tatha vīrya dhyāna upāya prajña carito 'ham // 166 //
XXbsu029_u:477: māṃsaṃ tvacaṃ tathapi ca majja śoṇitameva datta svaśarīrāt /
XXbsu029_u:478: prānte guhāsu ca yadā me śoṣita āśrayo 'pi caratā me // 167 //
XXbsu029_u:479: dhutayāna deśita jinebhiḥ yatra prayujyato jina bhavanti /
XXbsu029_u:480: tatra dhute satataṃ ca prayukto āsi caranta pure ahu nityam // 168 //
XXbsu029_u:481: etādṛśā vrata udārā ye ca niṣevitā caratā me /
XXbsu029_u:482: śrutvā ca teṣamimāścaryamekapade na bhaviṣyati chandaḥ // 169 //
XXbsu029_u:483: hāsyu bhaviṣyati ima śruṇitvā śāsanametadeva ca taḍānīm /
XXbsu029_u:486: śrutvā ca dharmamima śāntaṃ naiṣa jinokta ityabhivadanti // 171 //
XXbsu029_u:487: ācāryo me śrutasamudro āsi bahuśrutaḥ kathikaśreṣṭhaḥ /
XXbsu029_u:488: tenāpi caiṣa pratiṣiddho buddhavaco hi naiṣa tu kathaṃcit // 172 //
XXbsu029_u:489: parato 'pyabhūdapi ca vṛddhaḥ tasya guruḥ sa śāmitaguṇaughaḥ /
XXbsu029_u:490: tenāpi naiṣa hi gṛhīto mātra prayujyatha vitathametat // 173 //
XXbsu029_u:491: yatrātma nāsti na ca jīvo deśita pudgalo 'pi na kathaṃcit /
XXbsu029_u:492: vyarthaḥ śramo 'tra ghaṭate yaḥ śīlaprayoga saṃvarakriyā ca // 174 //
XXbsu029_u:493: yadyasti caiva mahāyānaṃ nātra hi ātma sattva manujo vā /
XXbsu029_u:494: vyarthaḥ śramo 'tra hi kṛto me yatra na cātmasattvaupalabdhiḥ // 175 //
XXbsu029_u:496: bhāṣeta no jina kadācit vācamimāṃ hi bhikṣuparibhāṣām // 176 //
XXbsu029_u:498: bhavitā hi bhikṣava mameha śāsani īrṣyamānamadadagdhāḥ // 177 //
XXbsu029_u:502: buddhasya te dhvaja gṛhītvā sevakarā gṛhasthajanatāyām /
XXbsu029_u:503: lekhaṃ vahanti satataṃ te śāsanadaṃ vihāya guṇarāśim /
XXbsu029_u:506: naiṣāmanāryamapi vācyaṃ naiva ca kiṃcidasti yadakāryam /
XXbsu029_u:507: staupika sāṃghikaṃ hyapi ca vittaṃ paugdalikaṃ ca yacca samameṣām // 181
XXbsu029_u:508: bhikṣuṇa vīkṣya ca guṇāḍhyaṃ teṣvapi cāpyavarṇa kathayanti /
XXbsu029_u:509: duḥśīla vañcaka praviśya kuhāste strī ca vināśayanti hi sughorāḥ // 182 //
XXbsu029_u:510: gṛddho gṛhīṇa tathā kāmairyādṛśe pravrajitva te gṛddhāḥ /
XXbsu029_u:511: bhāryāṃ sutā duhitaraśca teṣu bhaviṣya gṛhisamānam // 183 //
XXbsu029_u:514: kāmā ime khalu na sevyāḥ pātana tiryakpretanirayeṣu /
XXbsu029_u:515: vakṣyanti te sada gṛhīṇāṃ te ca svayamadānta anupaśāntāḥ // 185 //
XXbsu029_u:516: svayameva te yatha adāntāḥ śiṣyagaṇo 'pi teṣa na sudāntaḥ /
XXbsu029_u:518: sevārthameva na guṇārthaṃ te khalu saṃgrahaṃ dadati teṣām /
XXbsu029_u:519: śiṣyagaṇaiḥ svakaiḥ parivṛto 'haṃ pūja jane sadātra cala sidhya // 187 //
XXbsu029_u:520: kathayanti te 'pi ca janasya saṃgraha eṣa me karuṇayaiṣām /
XXbsu029_u:521: upasthāma prārthayāmi tebhya śiṣyagaṇebhya eva na kadācit // 188 //
XXbsu029_u:523: pravrajiṣyanti narakeṣu āgatā āgatā sada anāryāḥ // 189 //
XXbsu029_u:525: gṛhiṇo na te 'pi vna ca bhikṣū varjita te yathā śmaśāna iva dāruḥ // 190
XXbsu029_u:526: śikṣāsu cādara na teṣāṃ syānna ca prātimokṣavinaye vā /
XXbsu029_u:528: vanavāsināmapi hi teṣāṃ grāmagataṃ bhaviṣyati hi cittam /
XXbsu029_u:529: kleśāgninā prapatitānāṃ cittamavasthitaṃ hi na ca teṣām // 192 //
XXbsu029_u:530: vismṛtya buddhaguṇa sarvān śikṣadhutāṃśca te 'pi ca upāyāna /
XXbsu029_u:535: dhyānaṃ tathādhyayanaṃ tyaktvā nitya vihārakarmaṇi niyuktāḥ /
XXbsu029_u:537: na ca karmiko hyahaṃ vihāre ātmana hetureṣa hi kṛto me /
XXbsu029_u:540: damasaṃyame satatayuktāḥ saṃgraha teṣu te na kurute ca // 197 //
XXbsu029_u:542: saṃmodikasya ca mamedaṃ gaccha na te 'sti vāsa iha kaścit // 198 //
XXbsu029_u:543: śayyāsanaṃ nikhila dattaṃ bhikṣavaḥ sthāpitā iha prabhūtāḥ /
XXbsu029_u:544: na ca lābhasaṃbhava ihāsti kiṃ paribhokṣyase 'tra vraja bhikṣo // 199 //
XXbsu029_u:545: śayyāsanoddiśana teṣāṃ naiva bhaviṣyate 'pi ca kadācit /
XXbsu029_u:547: nirbhartsitā pi ca samantātte hi mamaurasāścarimakāle /
XXbsu029_u:548: vacanaṃ na caite mam hi smṛtvā prāntavane tadābhinivasanti // 201 //
XXbsu029_u:549: hā śāsanaṃ jinavarasya nāśamupekṣya hi nacireṇa /
XXbsu029_u:550: lābhābhibhūta guṇadviṣṭā bhikṣavaḥ prādurbhūta bahu yatra // 202 //
XXbsu029_u:553: sada satkṛtā guṇavihīnā bhedaka sūcakāḥ kalahakāmāḥ /
XXbsu029_u:554: te śāstṛsaṃmata janasya te ca bhaviṣyanti mānamadadagdhāḥ // 204 //
XXbsu029_u:557: ratnākaro yatha viluptaḥ sthāsyati padminīva pariśuṣkā /
XXbsu029_u:558: yūpa vararatnamayaṃ bhagnaṃ naśyati śāsanaṃ carimakāle // 206 //
XXbsu029_u:560: te cāpi bhikṣava adāntā nāśayitāraḥ śāsanaṃ mamedam // 207 //
XXbsu029_u:561: ma caryasevaniratānāṃ dūrata saṃgatiḥ kvacana teṣām /
XXbsu029_u:562: pretagatirnrake 'pi ca vāsaḥ tiryagatiśca ito hi cyutānām // 208 //
XXbsu029_u:565: labdhvā sa mānuṣabhavaṃ vā jāyati duḥkhitaḥ satata śocyaḥ // 209 //
XXbsu029_u:566: andho 'tha vā badhira kāṇo jāyati citragātra suvirūpā /
XXbsu029_u:568: viśrambhate 'sya na ca kaścit śraddadhate 'sya cāpi na ca vākyam /
XXbsu029_u:571: kṣuttṛṣṇa yena paritaptāste ca bhavanti sadā suparibhūtāḥ // 212 //
XXbsu029_u:572: duḥkhā ananta iti jñātvā dūra pāpacaryaṃ vijahitvā /
XXbsu029_u:573: sevetha sādhucari nityaṃ mā bhavitānutāpa iha paścāt // 213 //
XXbsu029_u:574: yasya priyo bhavati buddho āryagaṇaśca śikṣa dhutadharmāḥ /
XXbsu029_u:578: udyujyatāṃ ghaṭata nityaṃ pāramitāsu bhūmiṣu baleṣu /
XXbsu029_u:579: mā jātu saṃśayata vīryaṃ yāvanna budhyathā pravarabodhim // 216 //
XXbsu029_u:582: yadbhūyasā rāṣṭrapāla bodhisattvayānīyānāṃ pudgalānāmime doṣā bhaviṣyanti
XXbsu029_u:583: - anabhiyuktā anabhiyuktān pūjayiṣyanti, śaṭhāḥ śaṭhān pūjayiṣyanti, ajñā ajñān satkartavyān manyante, āmiṣapriyāśca bhaviṣyanti /
XXbsu029_u:584: adhyavasāne bahulāḥ kulamatsarāḥ śaṭhā dhvāṅkṣā mukharāḥ kuhakāḥ kṣātragurukāḥ /
XXbsu029_u:586: lābhaparyeṣṭyarthaṃ ca te grāmaṃ pravekṣyanti, na sattvaparipākārthaṃ na sattvānukampārtham
XXbsu029_u:587: te ajñānino jñānanimittamātmānaṃ pratijñāsyanti - kathaṃ māṃ pare vijānīyuḥ ?
XXbsu029_u:592: anyonyabhinnadharmasaṃgāyanatayā svacchandā dṛḍhavairā ākīrṇavyāpādā ayuktaparibhāṣāñjanasaṃjñaptyā iha śāsane cariṣyanti āparipṛcchanaśīlāḥ /
XXbsu029_u:595: te daridrakule pravrajitāḥ samānā lābhamātrakeneha śāsane tuṣṭimutpādayiṣyanti /
XXbsu029_u:597: te buddhaguṇān ricitvā jñātralābhamātrakena śrava(ma)ṇāḥ sma ityātmānaṃ pratijñāsyanti
XXbsu029_u:601: teṣāṃ punā rāṣṭrapāla tathārūpāṇāṃ pudgalānāmaṣṭau bodheḥ paripanthakarān dharmān vadāmi /
XXbsu029_u:603: apāyopapattiḥ daridrakulopapattiḥ pratyantajanapadopattiḥ nīcalukopapattirdurvarṇatāndhatvagatikāḥ pāpamitrasamavadhānaṃ bahumānyatā viṣamāparihāreṇa kālakriyāḥ /
XXbsu029_u:604: imān rāṣṭrapāla aṣṭau dharmān bodheḥ paripanthakarān vadāmi /
XXbsu029_u:605: tatkasya hetoḥ ? nāhaṃ rāṣṭrapāla vacanapratijñasya bodhimiti vadāmi /
XXbsu029_u:620: nāhaṃ rāṣṭrapāla ṣaṭaśāstṝṃstathā vigarhāmi yathā tān mohapuruṣān vigarhāmi /
XXbsu029_u:621: tatkasya hetoḥ ? anyathāvādinaste anyathākāriṇaḥ, visaṃvādakāḥ sadevakasya lokasya
XXbsu029_u:622: atha khalu bhagavaṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
XXbsu029_u:623: asaṃyatā uddhata unnatāśca agauravā mānina lābhautsadā /
XXbsu029_u:624: kleśābhibhūtāḥ sakhilāḥ sakiṃcanāḥ sudūra te tādṛśa agrabodhaye // 217 //
XXbsu029_u:625: lābhābhibhūtasya kusīda vardhate kusīdabhūtasya pranaṣṭa śraddhā /
XXbsu029_u:626: śraddhāvipannasya pranaṣṭa śīla duḥśīlabhūtasya pranaṣṭa saṃgatiḥ // 218
XXbsu029_u:627: daridrabhūtāśca hi pravrajitvā dāridyramuktāṃ samavāpya pūjām /
XXbsu029_u:628: taiḥ kāñcano bhāramivāpaviddhaḥ sa sasyabhāraḥ punarudgṛhītaḥ // 219 //
XXbsu029_u:629: lābhārthikoaraṇyamupaiti vastuṃ gaveṣate tatra gataśca jñātīn /
XXbsu029_u:630: abhijñavidyāpratibhānasaṃpado vihāya gṛhṇāti sa cāpi jñātīn // 220 //
XXbsu029_u:634: ghoraṃ prayāsyanti mahāprapātaṃ yato na mokṣo 'styapi kalpakoṭibhiḥ // 222
XXbsu029_u:635: yadīha lābhina bhaveta bodhistaddevadatto 'pi labheta bodhim /
XXbsu029_u:636: vairambhavātena yathaiva pakṣī kṣipyanti lābhena tathā ayuktāḥ // 223 //
XXbsu029_u:639: bodhyarthiko 'nveṣati buddhadharmān na tiṣṭhate cāpi yathā samokṣaḥ /
XXbsu029_u:640: dṛḍhāḥ sa lepena kṛtaḥ kapirvā mānābhibhūtasya tathaiva bodhiḥ // 225 //
XXbsu029_u:642: bodhyarthikenāpi mayā svajīvaṃ tyaktaḥ priyaḥ dharmapadasya hetoḥ /
XXbsu029_u:643: tyaktvā ca dharmāṃsta ayuktayogāḥ nirarthabhūtā nipatanti śāsanam // 226
XXbsu029_u:644: mahāprapātaṃ jvalitaṃ hutāśanaṃ subhāṣitārthe patito 'smi pūrve /
XXbsu029_u:645: śrutvā ca tasmin pratipattiye sthito vihāya sarvāṇi priyāpriyāṇi // 227 //
XXbsu029_u:646: śrutvā guṇāḍhyaṃ ca vicitraśāsanaṃ teṣāṃ spṛhā naikapade 'pi jāyate /
XXbsu029_u:647: adharmakāmasya kuto 'sti bodhiḥ yathaiva cāndhasya pathi prakāśanam // 228
XXbsu029_u:651: / tena kālena tena samayena siddhārthabuddhirnāma tathāgato 'rhan
XXbsu029_u:652: samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
XXbsu029_u:654: arciṣmataḥ punā rāṣṭrapāla rājño jambūdvīpe rājyamabhūtṣoḍaśayojanasahasrāṇi /
XXbsu029_u:655: tena ca rāṣṭrapāla kālena tasmin jambūdvīpe viṃśatinagarasahasrāṇyabhūvan sarvāṇi kulakoṭisahasrikāṇi
XXbsu029_u:657: ratnaprabhāsaṃ nāma nagaramabhūdrājadhānī yatra sa rājā arciṣmān prativasati dvādaśayojanānyāyāmena pūrveṇa paścimena ca, sapta yojanāni vistareṇa dakṣiṇenottareṇa ca, saptānāṃ ratnānāṃ ca
XXbsu029_u:660: rājñaḥ punā rāṣṭrapāla arciṣmataḥ puṇyaraśmirnāma putro 'bhūdabhirūpaḥ prāsādiko darśanīyaḥ paramaśubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgataḥ /
XXbsu029_u:662: saptānāṃ ratnānāmekaṃ cātra nidhānaṃ rājñaḥ prāsāde prādurbhūtaṃ daśapauruṣapramāṇaṃ saptānāṃ ratnānām /
XXbsu029_u:663: tasya khalu punā rāṣṭrapāla puṇyaraśme rājakumārasya jātāmātrasyaiva sarve jāmbūdvīpakāḥ sattvā āttamanaso 'bhūvan /
XXbsu029_u:665: tena khalu punā rāṣṭrapāla puṇyaraśminā rājakumāreṇa saptabhirdivasaiḥ sarvaśilpānyadhigatāni yāvanti laukikāni //
XXbsu029_u:666: atha khalu rāṣṭrapāla puṇyaraśme rājakumārasya śuddhāvāsakāyikā devatā ardharātrakālasamaye saṃcodayanti sma - apramattena te kumāra sadā bhavitavyam /
XXbsu029_u:670: paralokabhayadarśinā ca te bhavitavyaṃ na sarmakriyoddhureṇa /
XXbsu029_u:672: mā kumāra bhava supramattako mā pramādavaśamabhyupeṣyase /
XXbsu029_u:673: apramāda sugatena varṇito ninditā hi sugataiḥ pramattakāḥ // 229 //
XXbsu029_u:674: apramatta iha ye ca sūratā dānasaṃyamaratā amatsarāḥ /
XXbsu029_u:676: ye 'prameya sugatā atītāḥ sāṃprataṃ ca hi ye 'pyanāgatāḥ /
XXbsu029_u:677: sarvaeva kuśalaista udgatā apramādapatha eva susthitāḥ // 231 //
XXbsu029_u:679: dattaṃ tairapi ca kalpakoṭiyaḥ prārthayadbhiriha bodhimuttamām // 232 //
XXbsu029_u:683: rajyasaukhyavibhavāṃśca sarvaśo viprahāya dayitāḥ sriyo 'pi ca /
XXbsu029_u:684: raṅgamāyasadṛśaṃ hi saṃskṛtaṃ saṃśrayasva vanameva niḥspṛhaḥ // 234 //
XXbsu029_u:685: jīvitaṃ capalamadhruvaṃ sadā mṛttikāghaṭaka eva bhedi ca /
XXbsu029_u:687: neha mātra na pitā na bāndhavā dhārayanti yatamāna durgatim /
XXbsu029_u:690: kasyacinna ca kṛtaṃ tvayā hitaṃ vyartha eva ca niveśitaḥ śramaḥ // 237 //
XXbsu029_u:691: adya te jagata eṣato hitaṃ bodhiśāntamatulaṃ padottamam /
XXbsu029_u:692: majjamāṃsamapi carma śuṣyate yadyapi tvamapi mā kṛthā śramam // 238 //
XXbsu029_u:693: durlabho hi sugatasya saṃbhavaḥ śāntadharmaśravaṇaṃ sudurlabham /
XXbsu029_u:696: satpathe upanayanti te sadā duṣpathā ca satataṃ nivārakāḥ // 240 //
XXbsu029_u:697: sādhu vīryamapi kṛtva susthiraṃ kāyajīvitaspṛhāṃ vihāya ca /
XXbsu029_u:699: durlabhaṃ padavaraṃ hyanuttaraṃ sarva eva purimā narottamā /
XXbsu029_u:700: araṇyagocararatāḥ prabhaṃkarāḥ teṣa tvaṃ cara pathe 'nuvartakaḥ // 242 //
XXbsu029_u:703: eṣatādya vipulaṃ sugatajñānasaṃcayam eṣatā padavaraṃ hyanuttaram // 243 //
XXbsu029_u:704: atha khalu rāṣṭrapāla puṇyaraśmī rājakumārastata upādāya daśabhirvarṣairna jātu styānamiddhamavakrāmitavān, na jātu hasitavān, na krīḍito na ramitaḥ,
XXbsu029_u:705: na paricārito na jātūdyānabhūmiṃ gato na jātu sakhāyān dṛṣṭvā vismitaḥ /
XXbsu029_u:712: apriyasamavadhānaṃ priyavinābhāvaṃ bālollāpanaṃ saṃsāraratinirāsvādaṃ rājyasukhaṃ vimoghadharmaṃ (Vaidya, RP 144)
XXbsu029_u:715: sa ekānte tūṣṇībhūtaḥ apramādaṃ vicintayan priyavinābhāvamekākī viharati sma //
XXbsu029_u:716: atha khalu rāṣṭrapāla rājñārciṣmatā anyatarasmin pṛthivīpradeśe ratipradhānaṃ nāma nagaraṃ māpitamabhūt kumārasya paribhogārtham /
XXbsu029_u:717: dakṣiṇenottareṇa ca sapta vīthīśatāni, saptabhiḥ prākāraiḥ samantato
XXbsu029_u:722: sarvatra ca ratnasūtre caturdaśa tālapaṅktikoṭyo nibaddhānyabhūvan, yāsāṃ vāteneritānāṃ vātasaṃghaṭṭitānāṃ tadyathāpi nāma tūryaśatasahasrasya
XXbsu029_u:724: sarveṣu ca vīthīmukheṣu pañca pañca kanyāśatāni sthāpitānyabhūvan gītakuśalāni nṛttakuśalāni prathamayauvanaprāptāni sarvajagatparibhogyāni /
XXbsu029_u:726: rātridivaṃ bhavantībhirnānyā kthā kāryāṃ anyatra nṛttagītavāditena /
XXbsu029_u:730: teṣu ca punaḥ sarvavīthīmukheṣu annamannārthikebhyo dīyate, pānaṃ pānārthikebhyaḥ,
XXbsu029_u:731: yānaṃ yānārthikebhyo yāvadvadvastragandhamālyavilepanaśayyopāśrayajīvitapariṣkāraṃ suvarṇarūpyamaṇimuktāvaiḍūrya śaṅkhaśilāpravālajātarūparajata hastyaśvaśodhanaṃ sarvābharaṇaṃ ratnarāśayaśca sthāpitā abhūvan sarvajanaparibhogārtham /
XXbsu029_u:732: tena ca samayena madhye nagarasya samantato yojanaṃ gṛhaṃ kumārasya māpitamabhūtparibhogāya saptānāṃ ratnānāmaṣṭāpadanibaddhaṃ toraṇasaptapratimaṇḍitam /
XXbsu029_u:733: tatra caikaḥ prāsādaḥ kārito 'bhūt, yatra catasraḥ śayanakoṭyaḥ prajñaptamabhūtkumārasya paribhogārtham
XXbsu029_u:735: tasya khalu punā rāṣṭrapāla udyānasya madhye puṣkariṇi kāritābhūt saptaratnamayī catūratnasopānī, tadyathā suvarṇasya rūpyasya
XXbsu029_u:737: aṣṭottaraṃ ca siṃhamukhaśataṃ yena gandhodakaṃ praviśati tasyāḥ khalu punaḥ puṣkariṇyāḥ /
XXbsu029_u:738: aṣṭaśatameva siṃhamukhānāṃ yena punareva tadvāri nirvahati /
XXbsu029_u:739: utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkaiḥ satatasamitaṃ saṃpuṣpitā samantataśca ratnavṛkṣaparivāritā sarvakālikaiśca puṣpaphalavṛkṣaiḥ parisphuṭā /
XXbsu029_u:740: tasyāḥ puṣkariṇyāḥ tīre aṣṭaśataṃ ratnavṛkṣāṇāṃ māpitamabhūt /
XXbsu029_u:743: tāsāṃ ca vāteneritānāṃ vātasaṃghaṭṭitānāṃ śabdo niścarati tadyathāpi nāma tūryaśatasahasrasya saṃpravāditasya /
XXbsu029_u:745: upariratnajālasaṃchāditābhūt, mā kumārasya rajo pāṃśurvā śarīre nipatiṣyatīti //
XXbsu029_u:746: tena ca samayena tasmin prāsāde catasra āsanakoṭyaḥ prajñaptā abhūvan saptaratnamayyaḥ /
XXbsu029_u:748: tatra ca madhye āsanaṃ prajñaptaṃ saptaratnamayaṃ saptapauruṣamuccatvena aśītidūṣyakoṭibhiḥ prajñaptam, yatra puṇyaraśmī rājakumāro (Vaidya, RP 145) niṣetsyata iti /
XXbsu029_u:750: triṣkṛtvo divasasya triṣkṛtvo rātreḥ puṣpasaṃstaraḥ kriyate /
XXbsu029_u:753: sarvatra codyāne navatirmaṇiratnaśatasahasrāṇi yojanaprabhāṇi sthāpitānyabhūvan, teṣāṃ ca prabhayā sarvaloko 'vabhāsito 'bhūt /
XXbsu029_u:754: tasmin punā rāṣṭrapāla udyāne śukasārikakroñcakokilamayūrahaṃsacakravākakunālakalaviṅkajīvaṃjīvakā manuṣyapralāpinaḥ pakṣiṇo 'bhūvan /
XXbsu029_u:755: yeṣāṃ nikūjitāni nadatāṃ nandane devānāmiva madanīyaḥ śabdo niścarati /
XXbsu029_u:756: kumārasya ca paribhogārthaṃ pañcarasaśataprakārāṇi bhojanāni satatasamitamabhisaṃskṛtānyabhūvan sarvākārasaṃpannāni //
XXbsu029_u:757: tena ca punaḥ samayena viṃśavarṣāḥ samānāḥ ṣoḍaśavarṣātikrāntāḥ kumārakāḥ sarvanagarebhyaḥ samudānīya tatra ca nagare praveśitā abhūvan sarvaśilpasthānakarmasthānavidhijñāḥ /
XXbsu029_u:759: tasya mātāpitṛbhyāṃ koṭiḥ kanyānāṃ dattā, jñātisaṃghena koṭiḥ,
XXbsu029_u:760: naigamajñānapadaiḥ koṭiḥ, sarvarājena koṭiḥ kanyānāṃ dattā abhūvan /
